ygData.subject: Correction on Ares
ygData.msgSnippet: (I made a mistake, Ares fired FOUR, not THREE shots from each of his cannons. Which would correctly make sixteen.  He fired FOUR per cannon, which he has four

(I made a mistake, Ares fired FOUR, not THREE shots from each of his cannons. 
 Which would correctly make sixteen.  He fired FOUR per cannon, which he has 
four of, 4X4=16 and all that.  Just thought I'd correct that)
